title: Miracle of life
creator_credit: Jun-Ichiro Takeda, David Adams, Rokuro Hayashi, Pyramid Films and Cinescience
brief_description: Details the biological precision of the reproductive process. Shows fertilisation, cell division and growth, and the development of the foetus to the first heartbeat.
creator_credit_for_label: Jun-Ichiro Takeda, David Adams, Rokuro Hayashi, Pyramid Films and Cinescience
